package.name: Amēlija
package.shortDescription: Take full control of your wallpapers.

descriptionlist.description: Take full control of your wallpapers and blur them to your liking, LS and HS separately with 8 different styles to choose from! Changes apply on the fly, no need for respring (:

changelog.change: Added an option to only blur the LockScreen wallpaper when a notification arrives, transitioning the blur's alpha/intensity when you get one as well as when it's cleared & added an option to reset preferences.
